reviews.review_msg: The best public policy professor in BC
Good professor but seriously, 80% for a paper is a bit too much if you ask me.
Extremely well read and smart guy. Don't try to BS him. Fair marking system. You get the mark that's warranted by your effort and quality.
Professor Howlett is a leader in his field, Public Policy. The material is as dry as it gets but he is an extremely helpful, fair, and straightforward prof. Highly recommended.
